QuestData.Title: Infiltrating Voltarus
QuestData.Description: By now you've probably guessed the details of my plan.$b$bWe're using the Scourge's interest in you against them. You're going undercover. I know it's likely a death sentence, but if we do nothing your death is a certainty.$b$bTravel northeast to Reliquary of Pain and stand on the platform while wearing your disguise. Once inside Voltarus, you must earn the trust of the Scourge commander.$b$bWhen you've completed your mission, blow this horn and I'll fly to your location to receive your report.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stefan wants you to use your Ensorcelled Choker to get into Voltarus and do whatever the Scourge leader there asks of you.$b$bIf you lose your Ensorcelled Choker, return to Stefan at Ebon Watch to get another.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you earned their commander's trust, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, now... I must admit I'm more than a little surprised to see you, $n.$b$bTell me what you've learned.
